description:
This time in the #KinoCheckNews "Spider-Man: Brand New Day", “Dorothy”, “Knight Rider Movie” etc.| App ➤ https://KinoCheck.com/App | Best Movie News Show | All News https://KinoCheck.com/news

00:00 Spider-Man 4: Action in the Style of Jackie Chan?
By now, several details about the upcoming "Spider-Man: Brand New Day" are already known – from the appearance of the Punisher to the return of the Hulk. Now, we are getting new hints about what the film's action scenes might look like.

01:33 Knight Rider: New Movie in the Works from the Creators of "Cobra Kai"
A man and his car fight against injustice – and soon, they will hit the big screen: The Hollywood Reporter has learned that a "Knight Rider" movie is in the works.

02:22 New Trailers & More
Your trailer highlight of the week: "Sisu 2: Road to Revenge"! But there was also a lot going on at KinoCheck...

03:07 Dorothy: "The Wizard of Oz" Is Being Turned Into a Series
The success of the prequel "Wicked" is bringing "The Wizard of Oz"
title: The Best MOVIE NEWS 2025: Knight Rider, Jackie Chan & Spider-Man 4: Brand New Day, Wicked Series
